description:
Luffy keeps the forces out to destroy the Straw Hats at bay, however the crew needs to destroy all the mirrors - the final link that secure his safe return - on the ship in order to save themselves! At the same time, the ship is on a course for disaster, with Jimbei at the helm!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Green Room! – Jinbei, der unbesiegbare Steuermann!
Green Room: Muteki no Soudashu Jinbee
La chambre verte. Jinbei, un timonier hors-pair !
The Green Room! An Invincible Helmsman, Jimbei!
Зелёная комната! Лучший в мире рулевой, Джимбей
الغرفة الخضراء! رُبّان لا يُهزَم، جينبي
波の部屋[グリーンルーム] 無敵の操舵主ジンベエ
